page.title: 05LEISURE
page.content: As modern{life styles}change, learning to fly is becoming popular. There is a{flying school}at {Southampton Airport}currently with a dozen staff and 600 customers. To learn to fly costs about Â£3000 in order to gain a Private Pilot's Licence. The school operates a 38 hour course which must be completed in 6 months or a 43 hour course with no time limit. There is a 'classroom' for briefing and examinations. Each student must take 3 exams lasting for about 1.5 hours. They are tested on Air Law, Navigation and meteorology and the Principles of{Flight.}They must also take a General Flight Test. There is a 70% pass mark. The school use a single engine Grumman American Cheetah for training.
